        Constructs a Pixel which is abel to get the neighbouring pixels taking account of the boundaries.
        Parameters:
        point - the inspected point
        imageWidth - width of the image
        imageHeight - height of the image
        clockwise - clockwise or counterclockwise inspection of the neighbours

      • calcNextEdge

        public ImagePoint calcNextEdge()
        Description copied from class: BoundaryPixel
        Calculate the next Edge from the current pixel. Starts from RIGHT --> BOTTOM --> LEFT --> TOP Neighbour Pixel returns NULL if all edges where explored-
        Overrides:
        calcNextEdge in class BoundaryPixel
        Returns:
        an ImagePoint object or null if there is no edge left
